name: SurrealIsland
description:
Designer
Matts Borges

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Spring 2017

Engine
Unity

GenreExploratory

Description
SurrealIsland is just that. A game where players must explore an unreal and unrealistic environment in order to collect the four keys needed to unlock the mysterious room on the highest mountain.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
